mapper.update: UPDATE `pms_product` pp SET pp.`sale`= (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM `oms_order` oo WHERE oo.`id` IN (SELECT DISTINCT ooi.`order_id` FROM `oms_order_item` ooi WHERE ooi.`product_id`=#{id}) AND oo.`status`=3) WHERE `id` = #{id};
mapper.select: select p.`id`, p.`brand_id`, p.`product_category_id`, p.`feight_template_id`, p.`product_attribute_category_id`, p.`name`, p.`pic`, p.`product_sn`, p.`delete_status`, p.`publish_status`, p.`new_status`, p.`recommand_status`, p.`verify_status`, p.`sort`, p.`sale`, p.`price`, p.`promotion_price`, p.`gift_growth`, p.`gift_point`, p.`use_point_limit`, p.`sub_title`, p.`description`, p.`original_price`, (SELECT SUM(ppp.stock)+SUM(ppp.lock_stock)FROM `pms_sku_stock` ppp WHERE ppp.product_id = #{value} GROUP BY ppp.product_id) stock, p.`low_stock`, p.`unit`, p.`weight`, p.`preview_status`, p.`service_ids`, p.`keywords`, p.`note`, p.`album_pics`, p.`detail_title`, p.`detail_desc`, p.`detail_html`, p.`detail_mobile_html`, p.`promotion_start_time`, p.`promotion_end_time`, p.`promotion_per_limit`, p.`promotion_type`, p.`brand_name`, p.`product_category_name` , pc.`parent_id` cateParentId, pfr.`id` full_id, pfr.`full_price` full_full_price, pfr.`reduce_price` full_reduce_price, pl.`id` ladder_id, pl.`count` ladder_count, pl.`discount` ladder_discount, pl.`price` ladder_price, mp.`id` member_id, mp.`member_level_id` member_member_level_id, mp.`member_level_name` member_member_level_name, mp.`member_price` member_member_price, pss.`id` sku_id, pss.`lock_stock` sku_lock_stock, pss.`low_stock` sku_low_stock, pss.`pic` sku_pic, pss.`price` sku_price, pss.`promotion_price` sku_promotion_price, pss.`sale` sku_sale, pss.`sku_code` sku_sku_code, pss.`sp1` sku_sp1, pss.`sp2` sku_sp2, pss.`sp3` sku_sp3, pss.`stock` sku_stock, pav.`id` av_id, pav.`product_attribute_id` av_product_attribute_id, pav.`value` av_value from `pms_product` p left join `pms_product_category` pc on p.`product_category_id`=pc.`id` left join `pms_product_full_reduction` pfr on p.`id`=pfr.`product_id` left join `pms_product_ladder` pl on p.`id`=pl.`product_id` left join `pms_member_price` mp on mp.`product_id`=p.`id` left join `pms_sku_stock` pss on pss.`product_id`=p.`id` left join `pms_product_attribute_value` pav on pav.`product_id`=p.`id` where p.id = #{value}
